meanings.sent1: The bland and unnourishing food left me feeling hungry.
meanings.sent2: The unnourishing snack did not satisfy my hunger.
meanings.sent3: The unnourishing salad made me wish for a hearty meal.
meanings.sent4: Her unnourishing advice left me feeling empty inside.
meanings.sent5: The unnourishing diet lacked the essential nutrients my body needed.

meanings.definition: Lacking in nutrients or essential elements.
meanings.sent1: The unnourishing soil resulted in stunted plant growth.
meanings.sent2: The unnourishing drink had no vitamins or minerals.
meanings.sent3: His unnourishing joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The unnourishing relationship left her feeling emotionally drained.
meanings.sent5: The unnourishing meal lacked the necessary vitamins for good health.
